Title: XXXVI.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Tyler Van Patten (teleplay by), Jenniffer Castillo (story by), Jillian Molin (story by), Tyler Van Patten (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Flint and Silver's relationship threatens to collapse during a rescue mission; Max discovers the true cost of freedom; Rackham pursues his target.
